docs.title: OAE PINN Emulator
docs.text:
A Physics Informed Neural Network (PINN)-based emulator for tracer transport in Ocean Alkalinity Enhancement (OAE) simulations.

This site is coming together as I finalize my masters thesis at Yale's Earth and Planetary science department.

Up next: the codebase and a small playground for the trained models.

docs.title: Code
docs.text:
Codebase: github.com/OAE-PINN-Emulator

Repo + training scripts will live here (setup + usage docs coming soon).

docs.title: Playground
docs.text: Interactive demo coming soon (run inference on a trained model + visualize rollouts).
